consent_content:
TERM OF USE OF MOBILE WEBSITE “NICE INFOBOX”

Nice Infobox is a mobile website which is developed and maintained by Nice Info Vietnam Co., Ltd (“Company”) for the collection, processing and synthesization of personal information of a client who intends to request for a loan and/or issuance of a credit card (“Client”) at a credit institution (“Credit Institution”). After collecting, processing and sythesization, the Company shall provide such personal information of the Client to the Credit Institution where the Client intends to request for a loan and/or issuance of a credit card (“Transaction”) for the consideration and approval of Transaction by the Credit Institution. The Client acknowledges that the Client shall have thoroughly read, fully understood and agreed on any and all the terms and conditions regulated hereunder (“Term of Use”) by ticking on “I accept the Term of Use”:

       1. Scope of collection and use of personal information of the Client  

The Client agrees to provide and permits the Company to collect, process and synthesize the following personal information of the Client (“Client Information”) regardless of the forms of such information:

  1. Name
  2. Information of identification card/ citizenship card: Number, date of issuance, place of issuance
  3. Date of birth
  4. Resident address
  5. Phone number
  6. Information of account(s) on website and/or applications and/or other database of a credit information organization provider, including: username, password, and any other information necessary for the logging in such account(s)
  7. Credit score, Credit rating of the Client, and any information the Company obtains from the logging in the accounts of the Client

       2. Purpose of collection and use of Client Information

The Client Information collected by the Company shall be processed, synthesized, presented and made copies, in any forms for any of the following purposes:

  1. identify Client; and 
  2. provide the Client Information to the Credit Institution so that such Credit Institution shall review, consider and approve the Transaction for the Client.

       3. Period of storage of Client Information

The Client Information shall be stored by the Company from the time the Company receives such Client Information until the time of expiration of one (01) year commencing from the date Client Information transferred to Credit Institution (“Storage Period”). The Company commit to annul all Client Information upon the termination of Storage Period.

       4. Responsibilities of Client

  1. The Client commits that the Client Information provided to the Company is correct, completed and legitimate. Client shall be responsible for provision of any incorrect, incomplete or illegitimate Client Information.
  1. In case the Company fails to log in the accounts of the Client as provided under section 1(g) of this Term of Use, the Client shall immediately re-provide and/or verify necessary information of such accounts in order that the Company can access such accounts for collection of Client Information in accordance with the notice of the Company.

       5. Responsibilities of the Company

The Company shall take reasonable measures to protect Client Information provided during Storage Period and use Client Information only for purposes prescribed in Section 2 of this Term of Use; except otherwise agreed by Company and Client, or regulated by laws.

       6. Exclusion of responsibilities

  1. The Client acknowledges and accepts risks related to collection, processing and storage of Client Information implemented by Company, including but not limited: system errors, computer virus, internet transmission interruption, cyber security incident or others which occurs without fault of Company (“Risk”). The Company shall not be liable for any damages incurred by Client and arising from and/or related to Risk.
  2. The Company shall not be liable for any violation of the Credit Institution on accepting, storing and using Client Information.
